name: Set Guardian

specials.name: Elemental Conduit
specials.description: A Set Guardian gains Resistance 15 to a type of damage based on the gemstones set in its eyes; Emerald: electricity, Ruby: fire, Sapphire: cold, Topaz: acid.

specials.name: Unholy Weaknesses
specials.description: The Set Guardian gains the Undead trait and Neutral Evil alignment when it is the target of effects that deal extra damage against undead creatures, like the searing light spell. If the Set Guardian is within the area of effect of a heal spell, it doesn't take damage but still must succeed on the Fortitude save or become slowed 1 for 1 round (or slowed 1 for 1 minute on a critical failure).

specials.name: Instrument of Faith
specials.description: The Set Guardian is a beacon for Set's faith. A cleric of Set can channel a harm spell through a Set Guardian they can see within 60 feet. The cleric determines any targets or area for the spell as if they were standing in the Set Guardian's space.

specials.name: Mighty Blows
specials.description: The Set Guardian's attacks are especially powerful and it scores a critical hit on a 19 on the die as long as that result is a success. This ability has no effect on a 19 if the result would be a failure.

specials.name: Trumpet of Doom
specials.description:
A blast of sound trumpets from the Set Guardian, dealing 6d12 sonic damage to each creature in a 30-foot emanation (DC 33 Fortitude save). It canâ€™t use Trumpet of Doom again for 1d4 rounds.
Critical Success The creature is unaffected.
Success The creature takes half damage and is stunned 1.
Failure The creature takes full damage and is stunned 2.
Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is stunned 3.

items: x2 gemstones for eyes that are worth 200 gp each, +1 striking spear

immunity.value: death effects, disease, doomed, drained, fatigued, healing, mental, necromancy, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, unconscious
